I ordered this shirt Amazon prime the day before a concert and when I tried it on the day of, it smelled so bad and had a few marks on the back. Now I have to just suck it up and wash it and hope that it is fine because I need to wear it today. But it smelled like arm pits. Bad. Hopefully the smell comes out. I’m not sure who inspects products to be sure they can be sold again, but Amazon missed this one.  Otherwise though, I love the shirt. I’m 5’10 about 160lvs and wear a 34G. And I can still go braless in this shirt.
